hero.title: Riad Alassala
hero.subtitle: A tranquil riad retreat in the heart of the old medina, where contemporary elegance meets the timeless soul of Fes .

intro.title: Riad Alassala
intro.description: Riad Alassala welcomes guests into a serene world of warm light, perfumed courtyards and thoughtful Moroccan hospitality. Handcrafted details, quiet alcoves and curated art pieces create a discreet yet inviting atmosphere, perfect for slow mornings and long, candlelit evenings above the medina rooftops.

discover.title: Your Fes  Story
discover.subtitle: From intimate festive gatherings by the fire to sunlit breakfasts on the terrace, Riad Alassala is crafted for moments you will want to linger in.

festive.title: Festive Experiences
festive.description: Celebrate the season with candlelit dinners, live oud music and bespoke celebrations tailored to your gathering.

accommodations.title: Accommodations
accommodations.description: Suites and rooms blend handcrafted zellige, soft linens and calm palettes, creating a sanctuary from the vibrant medina.

dining.title: Dining
dining.description: Savor modern Moroccan flavors, rooftop aperitifs and leisurely afternoon teas in our tranquil salons and terraces.

journey.title: Family Moments in the Medina
journey.description: Share slow mornings over rooftop breakfasts, wander lantern‑lit alleys with a private guide and return to your own courtyard sanctuary. Our family offer includes daily breakfast, a tailored medina experience and thoughtful surprises for younger guests.

giftCard.title: The Riad Alassala Gift Card
giftCard.subtitle: Share the medina with someone special. Our gift cards may be tailored to overnight stays, spa rituals or private rooftop dinners overlooking the city.

reviews.title: What people who stayed here loved:

items.name: El
items.text: We simply loved our stay at Riad Alassala Fès, a real favorite! The riad is splendid, with its grandeur, its charm and all its history that can be felt in every detail. A huge thank you to Ali, who welcomed us...

items.name: Omair
items.text: The hostesses, Fati and Fouzia, were extremely welcoming and attentive to our needs.

items.name: Marc
items.text: Riad very well located. Attentive, available, warm staff. Very good cuisine. A big thank you for the excursions and the drivers. Congratulations to Ali, the manager, Fathi, Houzia and Ali the driver and the guides Bouchtia and...

items.name: Lahcen
items.text: Very welcoming and friendly staff. We spent one night in the riad and greatly appreciated our stay. The location is perfect for discovering the old city on foot.

items.name: Faycal
items.text: Very nice Riad. Right in the Medina and not too far from Batha roundabout near the Post Office street; convenient for easily taking a taxi, especially to go to the CTM bus station. Superb view of the Medina from the terrace....

items.name: Ababou
items.text: An exceptional riad! The place is magnificent, very clean and ideally located in the medina. The calm that reigns there is a real asset, as is the panoramic view from the terrace, absolutely splendid. A big thank you to Zeineb, always...

location.title: Location
location.subtitle: Find us in the heart of the medina

roomsSection.title: Rooms & Suites
roomsSection.subtitle: Discover our carefully curated selection of rooms and suites, each designed to offer comfort and authentic Moroccan elegance.

hero.title: Accommodation
hero.subtitle: Thoughtfully designed rooms and suites that echo the textures and palette of Fes  while offering every contemporary comfort.

section.title: Suites & Rooms
section.subtitle: Choose from intimate rooms for quiet escapes or expansive suites perfect for longer stays and family gatherings.

superior.name: Dar Superior Room
superior.description: Soft earth tones, hand‑woven textiles and tall windows overlooking the inner courtyard create a calm retreat after days in the medina.

patio.name: Patio Suite
patio.description: Spacious suites with a private seating area, zellige details and direct access to the central patio and its gentle fountain.

rooftop.name: Rooftop Terrace Suite
rooftop.description: Wake to golden medina light and end the day with mint tea under the stars on your own rooftop terrace lounge.

grand.name: Grand Medina House
grand.description: A private multi‑room residence with salon, dining space and exclusive use of a rooftop plunge pool and sun deck.

standardDoubleRoom.name: Standard Double Room
standardDoubleRoom.description: A comfortable double room featuring traditional Moroccan design elements, modern amenities, and views of the medina. Perfect for couples seeking an authentic Fes experience.

standardDoubleRoom2.name: Standard Double Room (2)
standardDoubleRoom2.description: Another beautifully appointed double room with handcrafted details, soft linens, and a serene atmosphere. Ideal for a peaceful retreat after exploring the medina.

juniorSuiteS2.name: Junior Suite (S2)
juniorSuiteS2.description: Spacious junior suite with separate seating area, traditional zellige tiles, and enhanced comfort. Features a private balcony overlooking the courtyard.

juniorSuiteS1.name: Junior Suite (S1)
juniorSuiteS1.description: Elegant junior suite combining Moroccan craftsmanship with contemporary luxury. Includes a comfortable living space and premium amenities.

juniorSuite2mez.name: Junior Suite (2Mez)
juniorSuite2mez.description: Unique two-level junior suite with traditional mezzanine design. Features a cozy sleeping area above and a comfortable lounge below.

executiveSuite.name: Executive Suite
executiveSuite.description: Luxurious executive suite with expansive living space, premium furnishings, and exclusive access to private terraces. Perfect for extended stays.

duplex.name: Duplex
duplex.description: Stunning two-story duplex residence with multiple rooms, private salon, and exclusive rooftop access. The ultimate medina experience for families or groups.

budgetSingleRoom.name: Budget Single Room
budgetSingleRoom.description: Cozy single room offering comfort and value in the heart of the medina. Thoughtfully designed with essential amenities for solo travelers.

budgetSingleRoom2.name: Budget Single Room (2)
budgetSingleRoom2.description: Another affordable single room option with traditional charm and modern convenience. Perfect for budget-conscious travelers seeking authentic medina accommodation.

hero.title: Dining
hero.subtitle: An authentic culinary experience in the heart of Riad Alassala

presentation.title: Restaurant Presentation
presentation.description: Discover our restaurant, a haven of flavors where traditional Moroccan cuisine meets contemporary refinement. In an elegant and warm setting, our chefs prepare dishes that celebrate the richness of local products and ancestral know-how.

concept.title: Culinary Concept
concept.description: Our culinary philosophy is based on respect for authentic flavors and seasonal products. Each dish tells a story, combining traditional recipes with a modern touch, for an unforgettable gastronomic journey through the flavors of Morocco.

rooftop.title: Rooftop Experience
rooftop.description: Enjoy an exceptional dining experience on our rooftop terrace, with panoramic views of the medina. Whether for breakfast, lunch or dinner, each moment becomes a celebration of flavors and conviviality under the Moroccan sky.

breakfast.title: Breakfast
breakfast.description: Start your day with a generous breakfast featuring fresh local products, homemade pastries, seasonal fruits and traditional Moroccan specialties. A moment of sweetness to prepare you for a day of discovery in Fes.

menu.title: Menu
menu.description: Discover our carefully crafted menu, featuring traditional Moroccan dishes and contemporary creations. Each recipe is prepared with fresh, local ingredients, honoring the culinary heritage of Fes.

hero.title: Exploring la Médina
hero.subtitle: Discover the cultural, artisanal and historical riches of the medina of Fes.

featured.title: Must-See Monuments
featured.description: Discover the emblematic places of the medina: Bou Inania, Place Seffarine, Moulay Idriss Mausoleum, historic gates and architectural wonders that tell the millennial history of Fes.

medina.title: La Médina
medina.description: Immerse yourself in one of the largest historical centers in the Arab world. Narrow alleys, traditional houses and vibrant local life await you.

souks.title: Souks & Artisans
souks.description: Discover traditional artisans: tanneries, coppersmiths, zellige, leather, weaving... Each neighborhood reveals its unique know-how.

tips.title: Practical Tips
tips.description: Tips to fully enjoy your visit: ideal times, cultural behaviors, recommended itineraries and best practices.

hero.title: Meetings & Events
hero.subtitle: Create unforgettable moments in the heart of our riad. Exclusive spaces for your private and professional events.

featured.title: An Exceptional Setting
featured.description: Privatize our riad to create unique events in an intimate and authentic atmosphere. Whether on our rooftop, in our salons or our patios, each space has been designed to welcome your guests in an elegant setting combining Moroccan tradition and modern comfort.

privatisation.title: Riad Privatization
privatisation.description: Enjoy exclusive access to the entire riad for your celebrations, family events or private parties in a refined setting.

rooftop.title: Rooftop Events
rooftop.description: A unique rooftop offering a magnificent view of the medina. Perfect for cocktails, dinners, photo shoots or outdoor celebrations.

diners.title: Private Dinners
diners.description: A personalized gastronomic experience in our salons or terraces, ideal for exceptional meals in small groups.

seminars.title: Seminars & Workshops
seminars.description: A calm and inspiring space, perfect for your meetings, training or professional workshops. Flexible configuration, available equipment and support on request.

services.title: Services Provided
services.description: Our team offers complete support: decoration, catering, coordination, audiovisual equipment and custom organization according to your needs.

groupOffer.description: Riad Alassala, an authentic gem in the heart of the medina of Fes, offers exceptional spaces like our Grand Salon and private meeting rooms.

hero.title: Gallery
hero.subtitle: Discover the atmosphere of the riad through a selection of professional photos, immersive videos, and day & night ambiances.

day.title: Day Ambiance
day.description: Discover the warmth and brightness of the riad in the early hours of the day.

night.title: Night Ambiance
night.description: An intimate and elegant atmosphere where lights and details enhance every space.
